name: Dubshoot - make short Videos, Download and Share
description: Make dub video with popular sound clips or movie dialogues and watch, share, download short videos uploaded by Dubshoot community. Make new friends and dont miss your favorite short video clips.  Best app to show your talent with short video clips. Be It your dance video or imitating video of best Indian celebrities or record your daily routines.  Browse lakhs of short videos for your Daily Video Status. Share Indian videos with your friends. Download trending videos for your WhatsApp video status. Best place to find all short videos of your preferred regional languages like Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam, English, Hindi, Bengali and Punjabi etc.  You can record selfie video and mix with variety of sounds including dialogues or songs of famous actors or actresses.  Dubshoot has millions of clips or funny dialogues of Bollywood, Tollywood, kollywood, mollywood.   Search for any sound belongs to Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada, Hindi, English language and share the audio clips directly on WhatsApp with friends.  Daily fresh content being generated. Browse latest and popular sounds or videos for Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada & other languages. Its easy to mix various sound effects to the selfie recorded video. You can make dubbing for dialogues or song or music clip of any sound clip.  Use most advanced search feature to find the sound or music clip you are looking for.   Some of our popular content included in these languages: English, Telugu, Hindi, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Punjabi, Bengali, Oriya, Gujarati, Marathi, Arabic, Urdu etc.
